data.title: The Futurist Universe at the Massimo Cirulli Collection
data.meta_description: The Futurist Universe at the Massimo Cirulli Collection was published in Volume 9 2019 on page 367.
data.text:
Sanna, Angela. "The Futurist Universe at the Massimo Cirulli Collection: The Massimo and Sonia Cirulli collection and archive". Volume 9 2019, edited by Günter Berghaus, Oleh S. Ilnytzkyj, Gabriella Elina Imposti and Christina Lodder, Berlin, Boston: De Gruyter, 2020, pp. 367-379. https://doi.org/10.1515/9783110646238-016
